summary: The diff adds a new CoinGecko debug testing doc stub and updates repository meta/summaries, but it does not provide evidence of the required backend Motoko changes (admin-only debugFetchCoinGecko, shared URL builder usage in getLiveMarketData). The new documentation file is truncated, so the required exact dfx commands cannot be verified from the provided diff summary.

evidence: File diff summary lists no backend/main.mo modifications

missing_requirements.requirement: Refactor getLiveMarketData(symbol : CryptoSymbol) to use the same buildCoinGeckoUrl(symbol) logic as debugFetchCoinGecko, with deterministic unsupported-symbol handling (clear English error, no traps).
missing_requirements.reason: No diff evidence shows any backend/main.mo changes to refactor getLiveMarketData or introduce/align buildCoinGeckoUrl usage.
